title: Underground Mining Supervisor / Ventilation Coordinator
benefits: Career progression to management, weekly pays, superannuation, professional development, free meals & accommodation, EAP support, salary packaging and financial advice
description: Step into a role where growth meets opportunity, with a clear path to leadership.
Lead underground coal mining operations with a focus on ventilation and compliance.
Mentor and support teams, drive safety culture, and ensure operational excellence.
Join a respected, innovative company providing critical infrastructure to the Australian coal markets.
